attributes.action: Honour the referendum result and deliver Brexit by the 12th April
attributes.additional_details: 17.5 million people voted leave in 2016, now people are signing a petition to overturn the results of the vote. That’s a betrayal of our democracy.
attributes.background: A petition was started to revoke article 50, a step that is unprecedented to cancel a democratic vote and trample over the will of the majority
